summary: Provides utilities to evaluate arbitrary Python code within a restricted environment, leveraging RestrictedPython to enforce safe built‑ins, guarded item access, and controlled iteration. Includes logic to verify that import statements are allowed before execution, ensuring that only permitted modules can be loaded.
business_intent: Enable the platform to run user‑supplied scripts or agent logic securely, preventing malicious operations and protecting system integrity while still allowing limited, sandboxed functionality.
